mapper.insert: insert into broadcast( title , image , broadcast_kindsid , istop , isflv , contents , addtime , hits, membersid , videopath ) values( #{title} , #{image} , #{broadcast_kindsid} , #{istop} , #{isflv} , #{contents} , #{addtime} , #{hits} ,#{membersid} ,#{videopath} )
mapper.update: update broadcast set title=#{title} , image=#{image} , broadcast_kindsid=#{broadcast_kindsid} , istop=#{istop} , isflv=#{isflv} , contents=#{contents} ,hits=#{hits} , addtime=#{addtime} , videopath=#{videopath} where broadcastid=#{broadcastid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.broadcast_kindsname from broadcast a , broadcast_kinds b where a.broadcast_kindsid = b.broadcast_kindsid and isflv = '是' order by broadcastid desc limit 3
select a.* , b.broadcast_kindsname from broadcast a , broadcast_kinds b where a.broadcast_kindsid = b.broadcast_kindsid and istop = '是' order by broadcastid desc limit 4

select broadcast.* , members.realname as membersrealname,broadcast_kinds.broadcast_kindsname from broadcast
left join members on members.membersid=broadcast.membersid left join broadcast_kinds on broadcast.broadcast_kindsid = broadcast_kinds.broadcast_kindsid
where broadcastid=#{broadcastid} order by broadcastid desc

select a.* , b.broadcast_kindsname from broadcast a , broadcast_kinds b where a.broadcast_kindsid = b.broadcast_kindsid and a.broadcast_kindsid = #{broadcast_kindsid} order by broadcastid desc limit 10

select a.* , b.broadcast_kindsname from broadcast a , broadcast_kinds b where a.broadcast_kindsid = b.broadcast_kindsid
and a.title like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{title}, '%'))
and a.image like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{image}, '%'))
and a.broadcast_kindsid like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{broadcast_kindsid}, '%'))
and a.istop like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{istop}, '%'))
and a.isflv like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{isflv}, '%'))
and a.contents like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{contents}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
and a.hits like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{hits}, '%'))
